  • Method Details

    • setZoneId

      private void setZoneId()
      Method gets current users ZoneID at login then sets the labels in Login Form. Timezone info is used for Scheduling appointments.

    • setLoginLanguage

      private Boolean setLoginLanguage()
      Method sets the Login Form elements text and error messages to language specified by Locale.
      Returns:
      boolean useForeign

    • loginLogger

      public static void loginLogger()
      Method logs login attempt activity to file.

    • setLoginErrMsg

      private String setLoginErrMsg(String msg)
      LAMBDA USAGE - Method uses user's locale for alert while writing the message to the logger in English. This is not custom lambda; it was generated by IDE.
      I didn't find it useful in this case and did not use it for any other switch statements.
      Parameters:
      msg - - Message in user's locale language.
      Returns:
      String message for alert and logger.

    • login

      private String login()
      Method builds the query string with users inputted credentials.
      Returns:
      String loginCredentials

    • setCurrentUserid

      public void setCurrentUserid(int objId)
      Set the successful login userid to the session user id.
      Parameters:
      objId - - The User_ID of login user.

    • onActionExit

      public void onActionExit(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Exits application.
      Parameters:
      event - Cancel Button clicked.

    • onActionLogin

      private void onActionLogin(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Returns screen to MainForm on successful login. login attempts will be logged in login_activity.txt.
      Parameters:
      event - Login Button clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException - Catch unknown exceptions.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle rb)
      Initializes the LoginFormCtrl class. Sets the label text for the TimeZone ID at Login and retrieves the language used for login.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - default application URL
      rb - default application ResourceBundle
